DESCRIPTION:
3bhk 2baths residential apartment for sale in bengal shelters sisirkunja, madhyamgram, kolkata north, kolkata
Sisirkunja is bengal shelters second dream project on national highway 34 at the northern fringe of greater kolkata, at madhyamgram. Here nature is in its glory a world away from the din bustle of the town still not far away from it. This property is located at the most prime location near madhyamgram crossing. It is 6 km from airport, well connected with central kolkata and 2 km from madhyamgram railway station.
It happens to be in a sound locality within a complex. The property provides you the ease and convenience of comfort living. It has the facility of security guards, cctv camera, car parking, 24 hours power backup, continuous water supply and so on. 
Some of the specifications of the flat are as follows.
 Foundation structure: Rcc structure
 Walls: Plaster of paris inside the flats. For external paints anti fungal emulation paint used. 
 Window: Aluminum frame windows with matching glass 
 Doors: Main door is polished panel door. Inside doors are waterproof flash doors 
 Flooring: Living & dining - Rectified ceramic tiled flooring. Bed rooms and other areas - Standard ceramic tiled flooring. Kitchen & toilet - Standard ceramic tiles in floors and glazed tiles on walls.
 Water supply: Water supply is through concealed pipeline with standard fittings. Garbage & sewerage system has been designed keeping in mind the health awareness of the resident. 
 Electrical installation: In each flat, electricity to be provided with concealed copper wiring and high-Class fittings. There are adequate electrical points in each room. 
 Lift: Of reputed brand
This property is unfurnished and ready to move in. The flat is in its original builder made condition and the buyer shall have the opportunity to modify the interiors as per his / her own choice. Flat being east facing, the rooms are fully ventilated and have abundance of sunlight coming in. The property ensures zero wastage of area and gives ample space to move around freely and to keep essentials effortlessly, emerging as a perfect place for a modern living. All basic recreation amenities such as gym, park, club house and play area is at close vicinity within the complex.
One can enjoy all major public amenities such as atm, banks and market. Being located on nh 34, public transport is at close proximity to the property.
To know more details, click on contact owner.

FORMATTED_LANDMARK_DETAILS: ['1 Religious Place', '30 Hospitals', '1 Pharmacy', '1 Library']
DESCRIPTION:
Property is conveniently located 50m from hazra road and 500m from triangular park with all available public transport services. The complex has 2 towers and 7 blocks with multilevel physical and digital security systems. It has modern clubhouse facilities with heated swimming pool, well equipped gym, billiards, carom, table tennis, yoga and meditation rooms. Plenty of inside and outside well guarded children play areas. For private functions there are 2 ac banquets and 4 furnished guest rooms.
In the tower, there is ac reception cum waiting hall with 2 elevators for occupants and 1 for service personnel. It has 2 staircases and permissible fire fighting equipments. There are 2 service toilets in every floor of the tower.
The flat is a square shaped unit with 3 sides open (South, east and north). The exit from the flat is from north. Extremely well ventilated flat with plenty of natural light. There is ample space between 2 towers with plenty of air circulation and adequate privacy. As part of interior designing, floors are laid with vitrified tiles, false ceiling with designer, multicoloured lights and wall to wall cabinets. Open modular kitchen (90s.Ft) fitted with chimney and water purifier. Living and dining areas (425s.Ft) is overlooking the clubhouse and manicured lawn with 2 split acs. Very spacious master bedroom (370s.Ft) with 2 widows (South and east)and attached toilet and split ac. Bedroom 2 (170s.Ft) with 1 window (s) and attached toilet fitted with split ac. Bedroom 3 (155 s.Ft) with 2 windows in e and n, has a window ac and shared toilet with master bathroom. Wall washrooms are (50 s.Ftapprox) each. Bathroom walls are fitted with ceramic tiles, modern bath and sanitary wares and storage geysers.

Overview
Looking for a spacious and luxurious apartment in kolkata? Look no further than this stunning 3 bhk apartment in white meadows. Inside, you'll find a beautifully designed living space that is both stylish and functional. The apartment features three bedrooms, each of which is spacious offering plenty of room for you and your family to relax and unwind. The living room is equally impressive, with large windows that flood the space with natural light and offer stunning views of the surrounding.

In addition to its luxurious living spaces, this apartment also comes with a range of top-Notch amenities that are sure to impress. These include a swimming pool, gym, and playing area, as well as 24-Hour security and a dedicated parking space. So why wait? Come and view today and experience the best of kolkata living in this stunning 3 bhk apartment in white meadows.

1 flat: 3bhk, 1156 sqft (Super built) + covered garage

Nearby facilities 

- Atms in 2 minutes walking range
- Medical store in 10 minute walking range
- Diagnostic center - Neotia meddiplus (5.3 km), hindusthan health point (6 km), iris hospital (8.3 km), peerless hospital (8.9 km), rn tagore (11 km), medica (11 km), amri (11 km)
- Schools/college - Lions calcutta vidya mandir (0.8 km); Harinavi dvas high school (1.9 km), narendrapur ramkrishna mission (3.3 km), b.D memorial inistitute (4.7 km), future business school (4.7 km)

- Saheed khudiram and kavi nazrul metro station in 30 minutes by auto-Rickshaw 
- Proposed metro station for garia-Baruipur line is within 1 km
- Rajpur bazar bus stop in 10 minutes by auto-Rickshaw
- Local bazar just outside white medows gate 2-3 minutes walking distance
- Several utility, stationary, confecctionaries and grocery shops outside white medows gate 2-3 minutes walking distance


Amenities
- Swimming pool
- Theme based landscaped gardens
- Air conditioned gymnasium
- Toddler's room
- Mini theatre
- Outdoor children's playing area
- Air conditioned indoor games room
- Yoga cum mediatation room
- Party/banquet hall (2)

Services

Specification

- Doors and windows of fine quality wood and aluminium shutters where ever applicable.

- Balcony: Vitrified tiles
- Attached roof : Tiles of reputed make
- Staircase: Tiles of reputed make
- Utility: Provision for keeping washing machine.
- Split ac provision on all bed rooms. 
- Cable tv/dth: Provision for cable connection for drawing/living and at all bed rooms.
- Internet: Provision for internet connection in drawing and at all bed rooms.
- Fire & safety: Fire dousing arrangements on the stair case of each floor.

DESCRIPTION:
Golden heights: Where luxury meets convenience in a south-Facing oasis

Welcome to golden heights, where the perfect blend of luxury, convenience, and natural beauty awaits. Our property boasts over 20 amenities designed to enhance your lifestyle. From the moment you enter through our grand entrance and exit gates, you'll experience a sense of arrival like no other. Here are just a few highlights:

Entrance/exit gate complex: A grand entrance sets the tone for your luxurious living experience.

Linear water features: Serene water features throughout the property provide a calming ambiance.

Planters with ornamental palms: Beautiful greenery enhances the landscape.

Tower drop-Off: Convenient drop-Off points for residents.

Adda zone: A place for social gatherings and community bonding.

Lawn area for community functions: Host events and celebrations in style.

Planter wall with sitting: Relax in the midst of nature.

Children's play area: Safe and fun spaces for kids to play.

Main infinity swimming pool: Enjoy a refreshing swim with a stunning view.

Kids' pool: Safe water play for children.

Jacuzzi: Relax and unwind in style.

Pool deck: Sunbathe or lounge by the pool.

Feature wall with water spouts: An artistic water feature for visual appeal.

Outdoor sitting area: Enjoy the outdoors in comfort.

The property's floors feature a combination of luxurious marble and granite, adding elegance to every step you take.

Overview

As always, vedic realty is the first to give you something totally different. The first to give you the sanjeeva bungalow estate, a gated bungalow community and sanjeeva duplex with personal, customized gardens. Sanjeeva orchard homes effectively amalgamate the sublimity of a green 'hanging garden' facade and the comfort of the exceptionally modern to create an idyllic space which could very well be the touchstone for contemporary, very affordable, urban indian homes. And since 'green' can never be enough, the condominiums are anchored by a sprawling central park which compliments the 'botanical' look of the homes that overlook it.
Adding to the uniqueness of these homes is the superior finish, fixtures and detailing which make a home both inviting and intimate.

FORMATTED_LANDMARK_DETAILS: ['2 Shoppings', '3 Educations', '1 ATM', '2 Hospitals', '1 Airport', '1 Banks', '1 Pharmacy', '1 Park', '1 Railway Station', '2 Miscellaneouss']
DESCRIPTION:
Beautifully surrounded with greenery all around, mukundapur is one of residential localities of kolkata.
Well connected with roads and other public transport, mukundapur has emerged as one of the promising localities of kolkata.
Mukundapur is a residential neighborhood located towards the southwest of kolkata. It is a part of the 24 parganas district. The area is surrounded by neighborhoods such as chak garia, ahalyanagar, nayabad and panchashayar. Residential locations that makes it an option worth living in.
Mukundapur is a short drive from the em bypass that enhances its communication with salt lake towards the north and garia in the south. The nearest metro station is shahid khudiram, which serves the briji area. The sealdah railway station is located at a distance of 13.7 kilometers from here while the netaji subhash chandra bose international airport is 22.4 kilometers away.
There are numerous educational institutes located in the vicinity. These include mukundapur vidyapith, young horizons school, indus valley world school, santoshpur vidyamandir for girls, calcutta public school and haltu girls high school. Hospitals situated here include vision care hospital, rabindranath tagore international institute of cardiac sciences, devi shetty eye hospital, sankara netralaya and medical super specialty hospital.

Duplex natura
 Rajarhat - New town, kolkata
Call 8617235 992
Project info : 15 block - 150 unit
Configuration : Apartment - 4 bhk
Saleable area : 2331 sq. Feet.
Status : Ready to move

Overview
On one side is the vast, green expanse of greentech city with its gardens, lawns and tree-Lined paths. On the other side are the fresh open greens of kolkata's first modern golf course.

Garden & cosmos

The lower duplex opens out to your private garden for a riot of colours in season. The upper duplex opens out to clear blue skies and the captivating twinkle of stars. While the ventral unit provides the efficiency and functionality of an apartment.

Pride & privacy

The lower floor is for dining, entertainment and the endless envy of your guests. The upper floor is your family's private space where you live and be as you like.

Facts:

220 four bedroom duplexes and central apartments.
Every duplex and apartment comes with parking facility and servant's quarter.

DESCRIPTION:
As always, vedic realty is the first to give you something totally different. The first to give you the sanjeeva bungalow estate, a gated bungalow community and sanjeeva duplex with personal, customized gardens. Sanjeeva orchard homes effectively amalgamate the sublimity of a green 'hanging garden' facade and the comfort of the exceptionally modern to create an idyllic space which could very well be the touchstone for contemporary, very affordable, urban indian homes. And since 'green' can never be enough, the condominiums are anchored by a sprawling central park which compliments the 'botanical' look of the homes that overlook it.

Adding to the uniqueness of these homes is the superior finish, fixtures and detailing which make a home both inviting and intimate.

FORMATTED_LANDMARK_DETAILS: ['Unknown']
DESCRIPTION:
Sl no. 145
Netaji metro
We are here with another eye catching project in the heart of south kolkata i.E in kudghat. Tramani ghta rd is just 12 min walking distance from netaji metro station. Kudghat is a developing locality in south kolkata. It comes under the jurisdiction of kolkata municipal corporation (Kmc). Other localities closer to kudghat include tollygunge, regent park and netaji nagar. The locality comprises few residential apartments including the ivory tower and daffodil greens. Kudghat bazar and netaji metro station are key landmarks here.Kudghat is connected to other parts of kolkata through bus and metro rail network. There is direct bus connectivity to places like rashbehari, chowringhee, howrah railway station, dakshineswar, salt lake, new town, dum dum airport, etc. The netaji metro station (Blue line) is placed along the locality.In addition, there are some well-Known schools and art-Learning centres. Academy for musical excellence, mansur habibullah memorial school and calcutta institute of engineering and management, are few educational institutions nearby. For fun and open space, there is a park named wireless kmc park and a kmc community hall. Kudghat bazar is a key shopping avenue for buying vegetables, fruits, groceries and related items. Also, south city mall is a popular mall situated 4 km from the locality. Daily needs accessories are at a stone throwing distance. Totally a project with the best deal to grab in this kind of prime areas. Do contact us for further details.

Overview
As always, vedic realty is the first to give you something totally different. The first to give you the sanjeeva bungalow estate, a gated bungalow community and sanjeeva duplex with personal, customized gardens. Sanjeeva orchard homes and sanjeeva shree effectively amalgamate the sublimity of a green 'hanging garden' facade and the comfort of the exceptionally modern to create an idyllic space which could very well be the touchstone for contemporary, very affordable, urban indian homes. And since 'green' can never be enough, the condominiums are anchored by a sprawling central park which compliments the 'botanical' look of the homes that overlook it.

Adding to the uniqueness of these homes is the superior finish, fixtures and detailing which make a home both inviting and intimate.
